desc: Throw away your cluttered makeup brush bag with this convenient 6 IN 1 tool. Brushes included - powder, tapered, foundation, angled, eye blending, and flat eyeshadow. All brushes are equipped in a custom, sturdy case, along with two end caps to ensure they are always safe and sanitary. Simplifies your beauty routine.

layout.text: THE SWISS ARMY KNIFE OF MAKEUP BRUSHES
